name: soccer-ban
description:
200 + levels...not available!  This is just a one level proof of concept Sokoban
with soccer gameplay..if it makes sense/is fun enough maybe I can make them 200 levels..

Anyhoo,  z key to kick /move ball. Another sports based game! If you have some ideas let me know i may make them... I use visualboy emulator to play game. Also a zipped file of the web version to try... Enjoy.
